Description: EU funding for the MARine COastal BiOdiversity Long-term Observations (MARCO-BOLO) project under Horizon Europe programme call HORIZON-CL6-2022-BIODIV-01-01 (Biodiversity and ecosystem services). Total project budget is 8614089.50 EUR with EU contribution of 7255037.50 EUR. Project duration: 48 months (December 1, 2022 - November 30, 2026).

Name*: UKRI Horizon Europe Guarantee 2022 National Oceanography Centre
UKRI Horizon Europe Guarantee Grant No. 10048178
Description: UK funding for National Oceanography Centre (NOC) participation in MARCO-BOLO project under UKRI's Horizon Europe Guarantee scheme.

Name*: UKRI Horizon Europe Guarantee Grant No. 10063994
Description: UK funding for Marine Biological Association (MBA) participation in MARCO-BOLO project under UKRI's Horizon Europe Guarantee scheme.
